item.title: Trump set for $1 million ‘candlelight’ donor meetings after last campaign
item.description: The president-elect is planning two big-dollar events ahead of Inauguration Day on Jan. 20.

item.title: Key Republican senator reports ‘good discussions’ with Pete Hegseth
item.description: After expressing skepticism last week, Sen. Joni Ernst now sounds more positive about Donald Trump’s embattled pick to lead the Pentagon.

item.title: Hegseth returns to Hill to try to shore up support for defense post
item.description: Get the latest news on the transition to the new administration of President-elect Donald Trump and a new Congress.
